footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Razor | Update Date: 02/27/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Serpent Spine, Mailed Flower, Rainslasher, Prototype Archaic

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Lightning Fang
**2)** Elemental Skill: Claw and Thunder
**3)** Normal Attack: Steel Fang

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
If going for an ATK% weapon, go for the Elemental Mastery sands and vise-versa.
This build can be played as a sort of hybrid build, allowing Razor to do Physical and Electro damage, and even trigger Hyperbloom if desired. How much Elemental Mastery he builds changes his main damage, leaning towards Physical at 0 and Hyperbloom at 600+.
